title: Disconnected from ranked game, Internet connection fine.
body:
Multiple aram games played before this one, no problem. As soon as I get into ranked however...
About 5 minutes in: Game is Attempting to Reconnect, 500 ms ping.
My connection, fine, server status, reads green as well.

*edit- The client also allowed me to queue for another match while this was going on, weird.
Couldn't get back in to match at all afterwards.

replies.body: Matchmaking and the game server are different services, which added in with an unstable connection could cause a lot of uncertainty.  Your best bet would be to run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix up whatever is causing this.  Be sure to test it out a few times in a custom game though to make sure everything has smooths  out.

Lag report BETA tells me 98/100. Had no prior issues with the game today, even after patching. Ping consistently around 33 ms outside of this one game.

I've also checked other league sites' Live game function, and it says the match has been going for over an hour now, still being played, apparently? Unless the other players were also disconnected from it. I don't know any of them, so can't verify.

Because your ISP is solid doesn't mean your own local connection or settings are stable.  Awesome ISPs can have hiccups as well.  Your access to other services might be good, but you can still have problems reaching specific services.  :/  Based on the symptoms you're having, those steps should help.
